commit message: Made the Quake library compile under the NDK.
Tweaks to get the code to build and run under the Android SDK.

Update the docs.
Install a prebuilt version of the QuakeActivity.apk.

Fix bug in texture cache

Texture ids are actually GLuints, so treat them as such.

Add support for Motorola Atrix (MB860)

This device has a second sdcard directory, so look there too.

Patch courtesy of Chales Allen, filmorependrgn@gmail.com
Fix formatting to fit on narrower screens.
Update build instructions for NDK r5b.
